Today, Dan and Jordan continue their investigation into how Alex Jones behaved in the immediate aftermath of the shootings at Sandy Hook. In this installment, the gents learn more about how awful Ted Nugent is, discuss UK crime statistics, and struggle with Alex taking a serious turn in his rhetoric for seemingly no reason.

==Tidbits==

*Sandy Hook Investigation
*Alex pushes a second shooter narrative and turns a corner towards calling it a false flag
*the history of the FBI targeting radical groups
*history of UK gun control and crime stats
*Alex cuts a promo on Piers Morgan
*did the movie Jaws cause beaches to go bankrupt
*are they cancelling gun TV shows
*Ted Nugent gets racist and hypocritcal
*Alex takes a Pledge of Resistance
*Alex advocates disrupting rallies and bullhorning politician's houses
*Alex shoots down a conspiracy theory because he's a petty bitch
*Alex begins criticizing parents
